comment: BE ADVISED , AHEAD ... Don't take it personal , I'm a little .. So I've been trying to get in touch with Google Support since last week . Just today I sat on the phone , on hold , for minutes , and was disconnected ... THREE TIMES .
amr:

                  :ARG1 (ii / it)

                  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01

            :mod (a2 / ahead))
      :snt2 c

            :ARG1 (ii4 / in-touch-12
                  :ARG0 ii3
                  :ARG1 (s / support-01
                        :ARG0 (c2 / company
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Google"))))
            :time (s2 / since
                  :op1 (w / week
                        :mod (l2 / last))))
      :snt3 (a3 / and

                  :duration (m2 / multiple

                              :unit (m3 / minute))))
            :op2 (d / disconnect-01
                  :frequency 3
                  :ARG1 ii5)
            :time (t4 / today
                  :mod (j / just))))

comment: That's hours of time time , I can't get back . God bless you poor souls with more patience than I , to sit on hold for hour after hour . " We record our calls for security and training purposes " What calls ? Are they actually getting through ?
